message: Generated 5 biological treatment questions covering: (1) Why antipsychotics don't help negative symptoms - tricky mechanism question, (2) MAO inhibitor contraindications - clinical application scenario, (3) ECT indications with high suicide risk - application, (4) 90% placebo effect criticism - tricky challenge to pharmacological assumptions, (5) ECT mechanism unknown vs medication - application comparison

key_features: All questions require deep understanding, not memorization
Clinical scenarios test application of knowledge
Aligns with content emphasis on treatment limitations
